data.title: The Chosen Season 4 Episode 3: Here’s when you can watch it on streaming | Release date
data.meta_description: "The Chosen," a series that breathes new life into a story told for over 2,000 years, continues to captivate audiences with its enduring appeal. Episode 3 of Season 4 is about to premiere and we have all the details.
data.text:
Synopsis

"The Chosen," a series that breathes new life into a story told for over 2,000 years, continues to captivate audiences with its enduring appeal. Episode 3 of Season 4 is about to premiere and we have all the details.

The enduring appeal of "The Chosen," a series that breathes new life into a story that has been told for over 2000 years, continues to captivate audiences. Now in its fourth season, this character-driven exploration of the biblical narrative follows Jesus and his disciples as they navigate increasing conflicts with empires and rulers opposed to his teachings.

Episode 3 of Season 4 promises to deliver significant conflict both from external forces and within Jesus’s inner circle.

Release Date for 'The Chosen' Season 4, Episode 3

Fans of "The Chosen" are eagerly anticipating the release of Season 4, Episode 3. While the first three episodes of the season were initially released in theaters on February 1, 2024, those who missed the big screen showing can catch Episode 3 on Sunday, June 9, 2024, at 4 pm PT/7 pm ET, as mentioned in a report by Collider.

Where to Stream 'The Chosen' Season 4, Episode 3

The most accessible and popular way to watch "The Chosen" Season 4 is through the official "The Chosen" YouTube channel. Each episode streams live on its release date and time, making it easy for viewers to tune in without needing a paid subscription.

Alternative Streaming Options for 'The Chosen' Season 4, Episode 3

For viewers who prefer not to use YouTube, there are other options available. The Chosen’s official app and website offer live streaming of the episodes as they premiere. This platform also allows viewers to catch up on previous episodes by signing up for a free account. This is particularly useful for those who might miss the live stream and wish to watch at their convenience.

Additionally, "The Chosen" Season 4 is available on BYUtv, although the episodes are released about a day later than on other platforms, as per a report by Collider.

Television Broadcast of 'The Chosen' Season 4, Episode 3

As of now, "The Chosen" is not available for live TV viewing. However, the CW network has acquired Season 4 following a protracted legal battle. This was a predictable outcome given that the network had also distributed the previous three seasons.

Preview of 'The Chosen' Season 4, Episode 3

While specific details about Episode 3 remain under wraps, the trailer hints at significant story developments. The Roman Empire’s Gaius and Quintus pose substantial threats as they intensify their actions against Jesus and his followers. The official description for Episode 3, titled "Moon to Blood," reads: "When Jesus heals a blind man on the Sabbath, religious leaders confront him, drawing a riotous crowd. Gaius defies a direct order leading Quintus to take matters—and someone’s life—into his own hands."

Episode Schedule for 'The Chosen' Season 4

The series follows a twice-weekly release schedule, with new episodes premiering every Thursday and Sunday. To stay up-to-date, viewers should mark their calendars for these key dates.

FAQs

Is The Chosen season 4 out yet?

The first episode of The Chosen Season 4 will premiere as a livestream on The Chosen's social media pages and The Chosen App on Sunday, June 2, at 7 p.m. ET, with the second episode airing on Thursday, June 6, at 8:30 p.m. ET. Subsequent episodes will be released on Sundays and Thursdays over the following four weeks.

How many seasons of The Chosen are planned?

The Chosen is planned to span seven seasons in total.
